about_the_game:
Missing some round, pink, fleshy things in your life? Wait no more and acquire this ludicrous Nipple Pack, it contains all the Unique items from the Gonzo update and gallons of other goodies, like DIAMONDS, bloodstones, shards, and a HAT, a MAGIC hat, it will grant you the power of looking awesome, now that's some real magic for ya.

Includes:

  • x4 Skull drop. (+2 green shards)
  • x4 DPS boost (+2 yellow shards)
  • Best deal on diamonds (+500 diamonds)
  • A truck full of bloodstones for good measure (+75 bloodstones)
  • Exclusive Nipple hat

name: Zombidle - Nipply pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Something that goes beep beep boop
  • Memory: 666 MB RAM
  • Graphics: mildly
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Pretty sure even with just the PC Speakers you're ok.
